entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe southwest gale gusting 130 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Watch upgraded to an Orange Warning.
